I passed the Not Invisible Act to combat the epidemic of missing and murdered Indigenous women and girls. Today, we extended the commission that bill created so it can keep playing its vital role in addressing this crisis and bringing justice to victims and survivors.

It was an honor to attend @ZelenskyyUa's address to Congress tonight. Ukraine's willingness to fight for their democracy is inspiring, and I'll continue working with my colleagues to provide the support the Ukrainian people need to defend their homeland from Russia's invasion.
Two of my bills to help combat human trafficking passed the Senate last night! I won’t stop fighting to prevent human trafficking, hold perpetrators accountable, and help survivors heal.

Last night, the Senate passed my bill to extend the Desert Terminal Lake Program, which has been funding conservation work at Walker Lake for the past 15 years. I worked with @SenJackyRosen to ensure this program will continue to support conservation in the Silver State.
